resources.string: Okaidinasai ! \nEnter your info to login/create an account and get personalized content (history, your own data...)
Enter a username to create a new account or just have a personalized name around the table (pass)
Enter your password to login or create a new account
Enter your email to login to your account or create one
You must specify an email and password to login to your account
You must specify an email, password and username to create a new account
You must specify a username to pass
